field_definitions.type: Type of work - 'feature' (new functionality), 'bug' (fix), 'refactor' (improve code), 'test' (add tests)
field_definitions.depends_on: Array of feature IDs that must be completed before this one
field_definitions.passes: Boolean - true when fully implemented and verified
field_definitions.iterations_taken: Number of Ralph iterations needed to complete (tracked automatically)
field_definitions.blocked_reason: String - if blocked, explain why (null if not blocked)
